page.title: 17Recreation and Leisure
page.content: Rutland Recreation Ground - one cricket square, one artificial cricket wicket, 2 football pitches, 2 hockey pitches, 12 tennis courts, one bowling green, a putting area, and a pitch and put. Gallows Inn Playing Fields, 2 cricket squares, 3 rugby facilities, 1 football pitch. Gordon Street- 2 football pitches. Kirk Hallam Playing Fields - 4 football pitches. Kirk Hallam School and Community Centre. Facilities are available for hire during day and night. Facilities include a red-gra (all weather surface), 3 football pitches, gymnasium, l artificial cricket wicket, 8 tennis courts. Community Centre facilities include lounge, bar and hall. Lake for fishing. Pewit - 9 hole golf course behind the Rutland Recreation Ground.
